Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class “A’ build-out in two-story garden office complex in Oro Valley, Arizona, north of Tucson along Oracle Road near 1st Avenue. Convenient to other professional services, retail, lodging, fitness centers, and restaurants. Exceptional high quality finishes.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Professional Office Suite in Pusch Ridge Centre

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The University of Arizona Tech Park at The Bridges is a ± 65-acre community of
innovation within a larger ± 350-acre mixed-use development project called The
Bridges which includes hospitality, retail outlets, educational facilities and residential
development providing a live, learn, work, play and stay environment. The Refinery
building is part of the Technology Zone within the UA Tech Park at The Bridges.
Development plans include up to five office and lab buildings for public, private and
academic users. The Technology Zone encompasses ± 20-acres of land within the park and is one of four planned zones, the others being Corporate, University and Business Zones.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: The Refinery at The UA Tech Park at the Bridges

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: First Level of planned Flex-Office Building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
As the second-largest city in metropolitan Phoenix, Mesa is larger in population than
Miami, Atlanta or Minneapolis. Boeing employs over 4,000 in Mesa, and Apple opened a $2B global command center there in 2018.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Mesa Grandview Business Park offers innovative flex-office project design with
modern architecture and site features expected by the most discriminating companies.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: First Level of planned Flex-Office Building

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Phoenix on ±51 acres with frontage on Loop 202, SKYWAY 202 is a new highly accessible business hub where today’s best workforce builds tomorrow’s success.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Skyway 202 Business Park offers seven tilt-wall construction buildings; four are Corporate Office (Buildings 2,5,6,7) and three are Flex-Office (Buildings 1,3,4). The site has Loop 202 freeway frontage, 5/1000 parking, and City of Phoenix water/sewer.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated on ±71 acres centrally located in northwest Phoenix, the Deer Valley Business Campus offers inspired flex-tech buildings that will suit your company's needs today and into the future.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Highly accessible to I-17 and Loop 101, Deer Valley Business Center plans for nine (9) 2-level flex-office buildings totaling ±822,287 SF, with abundant parking, 25' clear height, and Office and Industrial zoning.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: One- and two-level Corporate Office buildings
Two Retail PADs along W Bell Road

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: This ±82-acre mixed-use campus will provide a modern park design with buildings surrounded by extensive mature landscaping. Close to restaurants, hotels and other retail amenities, this business center will offer numerous sought-after features.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Bell 17 Business Center offers ±1M total SF of 1- and 2-level Corporate Office, Flex-Office, and General Industrial buildings and Retail PADS along W. Bell Road. Parking at 6/1000 available.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Conveniently located Goodyear on the I-10 at Bullard Avenue, Centerscape Office Goodyear is in one of the fastest-growing cities in the U.S.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Centerscape Office Goodyear offers two options for business needs: a three-level Class A Office building and an expandable Flex-Office building.
